Package org.jcatapult.deployment

Interface Summary
Deployer Interface for perfoming deployments This interface must be implemented by a deploy.groovy script located in the following directory context: .jcatapult/deployment/<domain> where <domain> is equal to the domain you are deploying to.
 

Class Summary
BaseDeployer Base class for groovy deployers.
CLIManager User: jhumphrey Date: May 15, 2008
DeploymentManager Main entry point to the JCatapult Deployment framework.
 

Exception Summary
DeploymentException General exception thrown if there are problems during deployment User: jhumphrey Date: May 15, 2008
